thread.title: Julie Rowell
thread.title_full: Today Lending LLC 208565 reviewed by Julie Rowell

author: Julie Rowell
title: Julie Rowell
text: I had a good experience with this lending company but they seem to be under staffed. The company sold my mortgage to a company in Texas and so far dealing with them has been a nightmare, I have still not received a welcome packet from them, and it's been 2 months since I was transferred.
